data.loadClassifier(path)¶

Loads an SVM classifier from a binary file at ‘path’ along with its EER threshold and the method that was used to train it

Parameters

path (str) – The path to the SVM file

Retuns:

(SVM, float, str): The classifier, the EER threshold and the method that was used

data.loadPhoto(path, histFunc, grayscale)¶

This function loads a photo into memory, detects faces in it and calculates histograms for each of them used the method given

Parameters

  • path (str) – The path to the image

  • histFunc (TODO) – The method of calculating histograms. Must be a callable

  • the image as the only argument and returning a histogram (taking) –

Returns

The calculated histograms

Return type

list(list(int))

data.saveClassifier(clf, threshold, method, path)¶

Saves an SVM classifier to a binary file at ‘path’ along with its EER threshold and the method that was used to train it

Parameters

  • clf (SVM) – The classifier

  • threshold (float) – The EER threshold

  • method (str) – The method that was used

  • path (str) – The path where the SVM will be saved
